typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		asset_id as string,
		fund_id as string,
		name as string,
		date as string,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(asset_id,
		fund_id),
	each(match(!in(["asset_id","fund_id"], name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
